item.title: Installing and Integrating OpenClaw Locally with Telegram and DuckDuckGo
item.description: This guide will walk you through setting up OpenClaw, a powerful AI assistant, on your local machine, and integrating it with Telegram for seamless communication and DuckDuckGo for web search capabilities.
